titles.title: Gädlä Minas “Vita of Minas” / Täʾamrä Minas “Miracles of Minas” / Mälkǝʾa Minas “Image of Minas”

shortcontents.shortcontent:
I) Gädlä Minas “Vita of Minas” (fols. 6ra-34rb) - Prologue (fols. 6ra-17vb) - Synaxarion entry for St. Minas, 15 Ḫǝdar (fols. 17vb-21rb) (cp. BSaint 246-50, ColSyn VIII, 308-314) - Gädlä Minas “Vita of Minas” (fols. 21va-31vb) - Mäṣḥafä kidanä tǝʾǝmǝrtu lä-Minas “Book of the Covenant of the Miracle of Minas” (fols. 32ra-34rb) II) Täʾamrä Minas “Miracles of Minas”: 2 miracles (fols. 34va-36vb) III) Mälkǝʾa Minas “Image of Minas”: 25 strophes (fols. 37ra-40vb)
Additio 1.

owners.owner: The name Täwäldä Mädḫǝn is written in the supplication formulas throughout the Ms. He is mentioned alone (e.g., fols. 6rb, 17vb, 22ra) or with other individuals: his father Täsfa Giyorgis (fols. 15rb, 16vb), his mother Wälättä Täklä Haymanot (fols. 15rb. 16vb) and his wife Wälättä Haymanot (fols. 34rb, 35va). Another person, gǝrazmač Abrǝha (of) Säsun is mentioned as the buyer in Additio 1.

txstates.txstate: The Ms. is worn; several fols. are dirty.

bindings.binding: Two wooden boards covered with reddish-brown tooled leather. Two pairs of sewing stations.

bndecorations.bndecoration: Blind tooled ornaments on the leather cover (at least 5 tools were used: double circle, triple line fillet, double crescent, x-form, cross hatching).

bnothers.bnother: Small holes are visible in the centre fold of the quires, close to the tail and to the head of the codex.

squires.squire: A(5; s.l.: 1, 2, 3, 4, 5, stubs before 1/fols. 1r-5v) – I(8/fols. 6r-13v) – II(8/fols. 14r-21v) – III(8/fols. 22r-29v) – IV(8/fols. 30r-37v) – V(6; s.l.: 1, stub after stub 6; 2, stub after 6/fols. 38r-43r).

taunit.ln-info: the number of lines changes between 15 and 18 (18 esp. in fols. 37r-40v)
taunit.rl-info:
Pricking and ruling are visible. Ruling pattern: 1A-1A-1A1A/0-0/0-0/C. Primary pricks are visible. Ruling pricks are partly visible. The upper line is written above the ruling. The bottom line is written above the ruling.
The scribe disregarded the ruling on fol. 15v.

txlines.txline: the number of lines changes between 15 and 18 (18 esp. in fols. 37r-40v)

rulings.ruling:
Pricking and ruling are visible. Ruling pattern: 1A-1A-1A1A/0-0/0-0/C. Primary pricks are visible. Ruling pricks are partly visible. Structural pricks are partly visible. The upper line is written above the ruling. The bottom line is written above the ruling.
The scribe disregarded the ruling in fol. 15v.

pchangeofhands.pchangeofhand: The difference between ም and ሞ is hardly discernible; the difference between ተ and ት is not always clear enough.

rubrications.rubrication: Nomina sacra; the name of the protagonist; the name of the owner (or commissioner/donor) and his relatives. A few lines alternating with black lines on the incipit page of Texts I and II; incipit (two lines) of Text III and of sections in Texts I-II; the initial lines of some paragraphs (esp. fol. 15va); some other words, e.g.: the date on fol. 36vb, sälam in Text III; elements of the punctuation signs, text dividers and Ethiopic numerals.

otherdetails.otherdetail:
Text I: - St. Minas’ death is commemorated on 15 Ḫǝdar (s. fol. 17va; s. also the Synaxarion, BSaint 246-50; ColSyn VIII, 308-314). 15 Säne is the day of the celebration of St. Minas’ miracles (s. A. BAUSI, La Versione etiopica degli Acta Phileae nel Gadla Samāʽtāt (Supplemento n. 92 agli Annali dell’Istituto Universitario Orientale di Napoli), Napoli 2002, 9, note 29), or, as mentioned in the Synaxarion, is the celebration date of the construction of his church (s. GuiSyn I, 611-613; s. also BSaint 1002). In the Ms., the date is mentioned on fol. 21va, at the beginning of the account proper of the Gädlä Minas (wrongly?). - Incipit of the “Prologue” of the Vita: [fol. 6ra] በስመ፡"… ንዌጥን፡ በረድኤተ፡ … ስምዑ፡ አበውየ፡ ወአኃውየ፡ ከመ፡ ንንግርክሙ፡ ዜና፡ ዕበየ፡ ገድሉ፡ ለብፁዕ፡ ወለቅዱስ፡ ሚናስ፡… (Discourse on the greatness of the Vita). - Incipit of the Synaxarion entry for St. Minas, 15 Ḫǝdar: [fol. 17vb] በስመ፡"… አመ፡ ፲ወ፭ለኅዳር፡ በዛቲ፡ ዕለት፡ ኮነ፡ ስምዑ፡ ለቅዱስ፡ ሚናስ፡ ዘትርጓሜ፡ ስሙ፡ ሞእመን፡… ወኮነ፡ ሥዩመ፡ ወመኰንነ፡…). On fol. 21rb, the commemorative notice is followed by a sälam-hymn: ሰላም፡ ለከ፡ ሐራዊ፡ ምዕመን፡ ሰማዕተ፡ መድኅን፡ ሰማየተከ፡ ሚናስ፡ ዘጸረተከ፡ ማኅፀን፡… - Incipit of the Gädlä Minas: [fol. 21va] በስመ፡"… ገድል፡ ወስምዕ፡ ዘቅዱስ፡ ወብፁዕ፡ መስተጋድል፡ ሰማዕቱ፡ ለእግዚእነ፡ ኢየሱስ፡ ክርስቶስ፡ ሚናስ፡ ፍቁር፡ ዝንቱ፡ ቅዱስ፡ ሰማዕት፡ ዘብሔረ፡ ግብጽ፡ እንተ፡ ስማ፡ ቄፕዎ፡ … - Incipit of the “Mäṣḥafä kidanä tǝʾǝmǝrtu lä-Minas”: [fol. 32ra] በስመ፡"… ዘከመ፡ ተናገረ፡ ኪዳነ፡ ትእምርቱ፡ ለቅዱስ፡ ወለብፁዕ፡ ሚናስ፡ አምላከ፡ አብርሃም፡ ይሳሐቅ፡ ወያዕቆብ፡…
Text II: - The miracles in Text II (Täʾamrä Minas) are not numbered: III-1) Healing of a limping boy at St. Minas’ grave (at which a church to the saint will be built) (fols. 34va-35va) (በስመ፡’’… ጽሒፈ፡ ተአምሪሁ፡ ለብፁዕ፡ ወለቅዱስ። ሰማዕተ፡ መድኅን፡ ሚናስ። … ወአመ፡ ፈቀደ፡ እግዚአብሔር፡ ያርኢ፡ ተአምሪሁ፡ ካዕበ፡ ወኃይሎ፡ በሥጋሁ፡ ለቅዱስ፡ ወለኅሩይ፡ ወለብፁዕ፡ [fol. 34vb] ሚናስ፡ ሖረ፡ ፩ወልድ፡ ሐንካስ፡ እንተ፡ ውእቱ፡ ብሔር፡ ወርእየ፡ ማኅቶተ፡ ዘያበርህ፡ ዲበ፡ መቃብሪሁ፡ ለቅዱስ፡ ወለብፁዕ፡ ሚናስ፡ ...) III-2) Construction of many churches of St. Minas by the order of the king (fols. 35vb-36vb) (ተአምሪሁ፡ ወለብፁዕ፡ ወለቅዱስ፡ ሰማዕት፡ ሚናስ፡ ... ወተሐንጸት፡ ቤተ፡ ክርስቲያን፡ ዘስማ፡ ቤተ፡ ፈለግ፡ በስማ፡ ለእግዝእግትነ፡[sic] ቅድስት፡ ድንግል፡ በ፪ማርያም፡ ወላዲተ፡ አምላክ፡ በእንተ፡ ብዙኅ፡ ሕዝብ፡ እለ፡ ይትጋብዑ፡ ህየ፡ ኀበ፡ ቤተ፡ ክርስቲያኑ፡ ለቅዱስ፡ ሚናስ፡ በመዋዕሊሁ፡ ለዜኖን፡ ንጉሥ፡ መጽአ፡ ኀቤሃ፡ ወሐነጸ፡ [fol. 36ra] ሎቱ፡ አብያት፡ ህየ፡ ወአዘዞሙ፡ ለሰብአ፡ …). - Blank fol. 38v interrupts Text III which continues in fol. 39r.

additional.cont: Fol. 36vb: Purchase note.
additional.det: The note, written in the main hand, states that the Ms. was purchased by gǝrazmač Abrǝha (of) Säsun.

extras.extra: - Immediate corrections marked by thin lines or by black and red dots, above and below the word: fols. 17vb, 27ra, 28rb, 29rb, 39v. - Corrections written interlineally: fols. 36ra, 10va. - Writing exercises: fols. 5v, 42v. - Crude note in pencil on the turn-ins of the front cover and inner board. - The name ሚናስ is several times encircled with a recent blue pen: e.g., fols. 24r, 25r.
